author: The Associated Press
title: Trump vs. the U.N., let's get ready to rumble!
description: President-elect Donald Trump is striking a blow against the U.N., and Jake Novak this is probably just the beginning of a beautiful war.
content: The Vatican is under pressure to let more employees work from home as its offices remain open two weeks after the Italian government ordered Italians home and shut down all non-essential businesses in an urgent attempt to contain the coronavirus.Vatican emplo… [+4694 chars]
